# create hash table. 
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table A(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table A(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table sbtest.A(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table sbtest.A(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create global table. 
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table G(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table G(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`G`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": ""
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`G`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": ""
        }
    ]
}

# create single table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table S(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table S(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`S`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": ""
        }
    ]
}

# alter table engine.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table A engine = tokudb"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table A engine = tokudb",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` engine = tokudb",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create index on hash table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create index idx_a on A(a)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create index idx_a on A(a)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A1`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A2`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A3`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A4`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A5`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A6`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# drop index on hash table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"drop index idx_a on sbtest.A"
{
    "RawQuery": "drop index idx_a on sbtest.A",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A1`",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A2`",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A3`",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A4`",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A5`",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop index idx_a on `sbtest`.`A6`",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table add column without database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table A add column(b int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table A add column(b int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table add column with database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table sbtest.A add column(b int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table sbtest.A add column(b int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` add column(b int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table add more than one columns.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table sbtest.A add column(b int, c varchar(100))"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table sbtest.A add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` add column(b int, c varchar(100))",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table modify column.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table A modify column b int"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table A modify column b int",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` modify column b int",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table drop column.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table A drop column b"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table A drop column b",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` drop column b",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# truncate table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"truncate table A"
{
    "RawQuery": "truncate table A",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A1`",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A2`",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A3`",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A4`",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A5`",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "truncate table `sbtest`.`A6`",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# drop table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"drop table sbtest.A"
{
    "RawQuery": "drop table sbtest.A",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A1`",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A2`",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A3`",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A4`",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A5`",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "drop table `sbtest`.`A6`",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# ddlplan scatter: create database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create database A"
{
    "RawQuery": "create database A"
}

# create index with table name issue#10.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create index idx_A_id on A(a)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create index idx_A_id on A(a)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A1`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A2`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A3`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A4`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A5`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create index idx_A_id on `sbtest`.`A6`(a)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table, table has quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table `A`(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table `A`(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table, column has quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table A(`a` int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table A(`a` int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with database, table has quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table sbtest.`A`(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table sbtest.`A`(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with database, database has quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table `sbtest`.A(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table `sbtest`.A(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with database, database and table have quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table `sbtest`.`A`(a int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table `sbtest`.`A`(a int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(a int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with same column name.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"CREATE table A(A int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "CREATE table A(A int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A1`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A2`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A3`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A4`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A5`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A6`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with same column name, table has quote.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"CREATE table `A`(A int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "CREATE table `A`(A int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A1`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A2`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A3`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A4`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A5`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "CREATE table `sbtest`.`A6`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# create table with same column name, with database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"create table sbtest.A(A int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "create table sbtest.A(A int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A1`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A2`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A3`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A4`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A5`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "create table `sbtest`.`A6`(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table with same column name.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table A add column(A int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table A add column(A int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# alter table with same column name, with database.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table sbtest.A add column(A int)"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table sbtest.A add column(A int)",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A1` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": "[0-32)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A2` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend2",
            "Range": "[32-64)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A3` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend3",
            "Range": "[64-96)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A4` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend4",
            "Range": "[96-256)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A5` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend5",
            "Range": "[256-512)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`A6` add column(A int)",
            "Backend": "backend6",
            "Range": "[512-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table R rename RR"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table R rename RR",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with database 1.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table sbtest.R rename sbtest.RR"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table sbtest.R rename sbtest.RR",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with database 2.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table sbtest.R rename RR"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table sbtest.R rename RR",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with database 3.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table R rename sbtest.RR"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table R rename sbtest.RR",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with quote 1.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table `R` rename `sbtest`.`RR`"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table `R` rename `sbtest`.`RR`",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with quote 2.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table `R` rename `sbtest`.RR"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table `R` rename `sbtest`.RR",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename table with quote 3.
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table `R` rename sbtest.`RR`"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table `R` rename sbtest.`RR`",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0000` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0000`",
            "Backend": "backend0",
            "Range": "[0-2)"
        },
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`R_0008` rename `sbtest`.`RR_0008`",
            "Backend": "backend8",
            "Range": "[2-4096)"
        }
    ]
}

# rename single table. 
"Type": "PlanTypeDDL"
"alter table S rename S_S"
{
    "RawQuery": "alter table S rename S_S",
    "Partitions": [
        {
            "Query": "alter table `sbtest`.`S` rename `sbtest`.`S_S`",
            "Backend": "backend1",
            "Range": ""
        }
    ]
}
